title: Macmillan Cancer
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114131im_/http:/typophile.com/files/macmillan-poster_4799.jpg)

Hi,

Does anyone know of a similar  
font to the one used in this  
image?

Thanks for your time

Font: 

 Opentype stylistic alternatives 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114131/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")
author: tm6464

comments.content: Not a font - all letters are different -

A search of MyFonts on the term 'blobby' yields [Banzai Moloko](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114131/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/banzai-tokyo/banzai-moloko/) and a search of Dafont included [Shark Soft Bites](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114131/http:/www.dafont.com/shark-soft-bites.font?text=LOSINGSLEEPC&fpp=100&back=theme).
